text: Uninzi lwaBantu beNcwadi lunqwenela ukuba akwaba belunokunilukuhla nijike nibe ngabangakholwayo emva kokuba nikholiwe ngenxa yomona osezintliziyweni zabo nangona sele beyibonile inyaniso39. Kodwa xolelani ningengathi aniboni de uAllâh Athobe uMyalelo40 waKhe. Inene uAllâh Uyakwazi ukwenza izinto zonke
